pages.text: First of all, you will need to find some Elematilius Ores. By mining them, you will obtain elematilius, a strange purple stone.
This is a strange purple stone.
With your brand new elematilius, you are now able to craft your first Croparia ! You will soon be able to craft your first seed. You can also craft elematilius if you need to.
pages.title: Some Crafts

pages.text: Congratulation ! You can now have unlimited acacia saplings, black dyes, vines and so much more ! Humm... you are a bit disapointed I see. If you want the netherite seed, you still have a lot of work to do !
pages.title: SEEDS !

pages.text: Once you harvest your crops, you will have some fruits. Break them on a block to collect your precious items
